open parentheses table row cell b to the power of 4 over 5 end exponent b to the power of negative 6 over 5 end exponent end cell end table close parentheses to the power of 5 over 2 end exponent equals open parentheses table row cell b to the power of negative 2 over 5 end exponent end cell end table close parentheses to the power of 5 over 2 end exponent equals b to the power of negative 1 end exponent equals 1 over b
